unacceptreason: Invalid: junior secondary homonym of Stiliger nigrovittatus (A. Costa, 1866); Stiliger raorum is a replacement name
citation: Bouchet, P. (2016). Stiliger nigrovittatus Rao & Rao, 1963. In:  MolluscaBase (2017). Accessed through:  World Register of Marine Species at http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id=551521 on 2017-12-10
